violations.excerpt: name does not meet format requirements
package name similar to existing packages

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: Congratulations on the new package! However, [as a general rule](https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/dev/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1), we would like to avoid acronyms in package names. Using `HierarchicalStateMachines.jl` as the name of this package should be totally fine.

discussion.author: AndrewWasHere
discussion.text: Renamed. Presumably, I just create a new issue on my repo and comment `@JuilaRegistrator register()` again?

discussion.author: goerz
discussion.text: Yes, that’s right. Or just directly comment on the commit you want to tag. You don’t actually need an issue.
